definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: This article takes the Longhui Dialect as the example, inspecting its certain dialect word meaning.
sentences.chinese: 文章以隆回方言为例，考察其若干方言词义。

sentences.english: Some dictionary writer use citation to show what word mean.
sentences.chinese: 有些辞典的编纂者用引文作例证以解释词义。

sentences.english: Ane-pal told me I should recite them and not look up the meaning of the words.
sentences.chinese: 一位网右告诉我应该朗诵诗歌，不要查去词义。

sentences.english: Componential analysis is a semantic approach to explaining lexical meaning.
sentences.chinese: 语义成分分析是一种解释词义的语义学方法。

sentences.english: Word Sense Disambiguation (WSD) has always been a difficult and hot points in natural language processing.
sentences.chinese: 词义消歧是自然然语言处理中的一个难点和热点问题。

sentences.english: Word sense disambiguation is one of the difficult problems and a key point in natural language processing.
sentences.chinese: 词义排岐是自然语言处理的重点和难点问题之一。

sentences.english: A certain word takes on its meaning from the context in which it's related to.
sentences.chinese: 某一词项的词义值由与之相联系的相邻诸词决定。

sentences.english: The other is the development of acceptation still use the form of single syllable words.
sentences.chinese: 一是词义发展继续利用单音词的形式。

sentences.english: Meanings generated through the metaphor that we call it metaphors.
sentences.chinese: 通过比喻产生的词义我们称之为比喻义。

sentences.english: The precision rate of word sense disambiguation depends on the completeness of disambiguation knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 词义排歧的精确率依赖于排歧知识的完备性。

sentences.english: Synonymy is a realization of semantic paradigmatic relationship.
sentences.chinese: 同义关系是词义聚合的重要表现。

sentences.english: Just defining the term "nomad" is problematic in India.
sentences.chinese: 在印度“游牧”一词词义也存有争议。

sentences.english: Morphemes metaphor or metonymy used to form the meaning of a word is called recessive relationship.
sentences.chinese: 语素义通过比喻或转喻来构成词义的叫作隐性关系。

sentences.english: The lighthouse is an important mark for pilots.
sentences.chinese: 第三句是讲海中的灯标的，词义应当是“灯塔”。

sentences.english: Classify them and explore the source.
sentences.chinese: 对它的词义构合关系进行归类探源。

sentences.english: It is really a difficult thing to distinguish the slight difference among these words.
sentences.chinese: 把这些词义的细微差别区分开来确实是件很难办的事。

definition: part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
